br.title: The currency GBP/JPY handeln is displayed in the header of the top banner instead of GBP/USD handeln

steps.step_1: Navigate_to_capital.com Choose German language Click button [Burger Menu] Click menu section [Traden lernen] (Learn to Trade) Click menu item [Forex - Handel] (Forex trading guide) Choose currency GBP/USD in sidebar item

br.expected_result: The currency GBP/USD handeln is displayed in the header of the top banner
br.actual_result: The currency GBP/JPY handeln is displayed in the header of the top banner
